CSUF Online Programs



Online Certificate Programs
Online Degree Completion Programs
Online Programs for Educators
Online Training Courses
View All Certificate Programs


 Online programs provide the same benefits of an in-class experience with the added convenience of flexibility. Programs are structured with lectures and assignments, and allow you to interact and communicate with students and instructors/professors online. 
 Below you will find a list of available online programs, including certificate programs, degree-completion programs and programs for educators. 
CSUF Online Certificate Programs
 Our online certificate programs are developed and led by industry experts working in the field, and are designed to provide a valuable and in-demand skill set. Below you will find the available online certificate programs. 




 

Advanced Manufacturing Engineering



Length: 4 months
Cost: $1,800*








California State University Biomanufacturing Technician in Partnership with Biocom California Institute



Length: 6 months
Cost: $4,950*





 

Community Association Management



Length: 3 months
Cost: $1,500*





 

Computer Forensics - Digital and Mobile



Length: 8-10 months
Cost: $3,280*





 

Data Science & Data Analytics



Length: 10 months
Cost: $4,050*





 

Digital Marketing



Length: 10 months
Cost: $3,240*





 

Geographic Information Systems



Length: 8 months
Cost: $3,210*





 

Professional Fiduciary Management



Length: 6 months
Cost: $2,000* 





 

User Experience (UX)



Length: 10-12 months
Cost: $4,240






Graduate Certificate




Human Resources Management



The Graduate Certificate in HR Management is currently under review and is not available at this time. Please check back with us in Fall 2022 for updates.

Length: Varies 
Cost: Varies

CSUF Online Degree Completion Programs
 Degree-completion programs offer the same degree on-campus program, with the added convenience of being online. Click on the program below to learn more details. 




 

BA in Business Administration 



Length: 3 years
Cost: $500 per unit*





 

BA in Sociology



Length: 3 years
Cost: $425 per unit*





 

BA in Humanities & Social Sciences



Length: 3 years
Cost: $425 per unit*








 * Costs are approximate and subject to change 



 
CSUF Online Programs for Educators
 All educator programs are offered online. Visit the Programs for Educators page to view available programs. 
Programs for Educators 






What's Your Next Step?
 Learn how to successfully take courses online or join our email list. By joining our email list, we will send you important program updates. 





Online Learning

 Review our guidelines for online learning. 
 Online Learning 





						&amp;lt;a href="https://uee.formstack.com/forms/csufeip_stayconnected" title="Online Form"&amp;gt;Online Form - Prof Dev Master Email Sign-up - Clean up COPY&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
						




Non-California Residents
 Due to state and federal regulations, non-California residents may only enroll in CSUF online courses when their state has authorized CSUF as a provider. You can learn more about online program eligibility on the  State Regulations page. 






















  Email Us: eipconnect@fullerton.edu



  Phone: (657) 278-2611
